channel.title: Your Dumbest Moves
channel.description:
Seen a few stories of Heroes , had a few myself .
But what is the dumbest move you have made ?
My stupidest moment of brain blank was
I once got jailed night 1 and being an evil I chucked out that I was sheriff as my cover . Then 3 seconds later when my brain turned on I realised this was an awful claim for a Cult Leader ...
The surprising thing on this one is I didn't die until the prince died about turn 5 . Must of been a newbie prince , as soon as they read his log I was done for ....

item.title: Your Dumbest Moves
item.dc:creator: newarkinvaders
item.description:
I do love this game for stuff like this . flip side to your plan is that if you are too special to claim to the court . makes you a big target
like when people name all the bd they visit but leave the Prince as bd confidential …

Read full topic

item.title: Your Dumbest Moves
item.dc:creator: livejamie
item.description:
You can give log information in private. It’s better to whisper the king that you’re the priest and they need to leave you alone, rather than announcing you’re priest immediately to everybody.

Give it a few seconds and if king isn’t responding then tell everybody.

Good way to find an evil king as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Your Dumbest Moves
item.dc:creator: SuperSocrates
item.description:
Yea I don’t really see the alternative. If you don’t give enough info from log you are getting executed because most likely you are evil in that case.

Read full topic

item.title: Your Dumbest Moves
item.dc:creator: Sandy_Claws
item.description:
My dumbest thing was my 1st game possessor and I tried to make someone attack the king but I ended up making the king attack instead. On night one. Where everyone has their observers on the king. I died the next morning within 10 seconds.

Read full topic

item.title: Your Dumbest Moves
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
Oh goodness

This isn’t actually me, but still

I’ve seen some people do some really dumb things in my time with ToS and ToL, but the Prince I had just a few days ago takes the cake

So this guy jails me and asks for my claim and Journal, which I provided. He lets me live and all is good.

The next night, he jails me again and asks what I did the previous night. When I tell him I didn’t do anything, he executes me.

Read full topic

item.title: Your Dumbest Moves
item.dc:creator: CN73DRUMMER
item.description:
Yeah. “Exe me next round if I’m wrong” -every scorned ever.

Read full topic

item.title: Your Dumbest Moves
item.dc:creator: newarkinvaders
item.description:
if you are on the stand and don’t give your log though I am gonna exe you.
Also in your example you are the cult . you already know 2 and 3 are ns

Read full topic

item.title: Your Dumbest Moves
item.dc:creator: livejamie
item.description:
Influx of new people makes it hard to tell. People so readily out themselves when they start playing this game.

If I’m a bad guy and we have 1, 5 and 10 on our team, if I see 7 whisper the wing and then 5 gets executed?.

7 is as good as dead.

People also spit out their entire logs when they’re on the stand drives me crazy too. Have had lots of BD members get themselves killed this way.

“OMG I’M PALADIN DON’T DO THIS / N1 - 2 - NS / N2 - 3 NS / N3 - 5 - UNSEEN!”

Welp. Even if they don’t execute you now you’re a dead man. And now we know to kill 2 and 3, thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Your Dumbest Moves
item.dc:creator: newarkinvaders
item.description:
I now completely refuse to believe turn 1 peaks and sheriff investigates.
If the guy followes it up with ‘exe me next turn if I am wrong .’ it makes me determined to get the accuser exed first

Read full topic

item.title: Your Dumbest Moves
item.dc:creator: livejamie
item.description:
I was a King that didn’t realize the Posessor could jump into occupy immune classes and lost to one when he jumped into the Prince that the Priest ressed.

Read full topic

item.title: Your Dumbest Moves
item.dc:creator: CN73DRUMMER
item.description:
Every time a scorned accuses somebody d2 and I fall for it. I never feel more stupid than those moments.

Which reminds me I was priest yesterday. Psychic linked me N1 with king. I tell them my role etc etc. d2 scorned says I’m suspicious and everybody executes me. I was even pleading yo king, psychic, say something! They so blindly were accusing me that king and psychic didn’t even realize i was the guy they talked to last night. Everybody was so surprised when I turned out to be priest…

Read full topic

item.title: Your Dumbest Moves
item.dc:creator: Sketch
item.description:
Being the Evil King and not realizing in a 3 evil vs. 3 BD situation that we had majority because of my double vote

Read full topic

item.title: Your Dumbest Moves
item.dc:creator: Ben_Pollard
item.description:
I remember one game where a Cult member had died on N2/D3 and I was then jailed by the Prince.
I (not noticing how dumb I was being) then decided, ez claim Sheriff!

… Prince laughs, executes me. facepalm

Read full topic
